018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.http;
019
020import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
021import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceStability;
022
023/**
024 * This interface contains constants for configuration keys used in the hbase http server code.
025 */
026@InterfaceAudience.Private
027@InterfaceStability.Evolving
028public interface ServerConfigurationKeys {
029
030  /** Enable/Disable ssl for http server */
031  public static final String HBASE_SSL_ENABLED_KEY = "hbase.ssl.enabled";
032
033  public static final boolean HBASE_SSL_ENABLED_DEFAULT = false;
034
035  /** Enable/Disable aliases serving from jetty */
036  public static final String HBASE_JETTY_LOGS_SERVE_ALIASES = "hbase.jetty.logs.serve.aliases";
037
038  public static final boolean DEFAULT_HBASE_JETTY_LOGS_SERVE_ALIASES = true;
039
040  public static final String HBASE_HTTP_STATIC_USER = "hbase.http.staticuser.user";
041
042  public static final String DEFAULT_HBASE_HTTP_STATIC_USER = "dr.stack";
043
044}
